properties.areaDesc: Santa Rosa, FL; Escambia, AL; Covington, AL; Okaloosa, FL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 4 at 9:52PM CST until February 8 at 11:08AM CST by NWS Mobile AL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a flood warning for the
following rivers in Alabama...Florida...

Tombigbee River Near Coffeeville Dam affecting Choctaw...Clarke and Washington
Counties.
Tombigbee River Near Leroy affecting Choctaw...Clarke and Washington Counties.
Blackwater River Near Baker affecting Covington...Escambia...Okaloosa and
Santa Rosa Counties.
Big Coldwater Creek Near Milton affecting Okaloosa and Santa Rosa Counties.
Shoal River Near Crestview affecting Okaloosa County.

.Heavy rainfall is forecast to occur over the next 24 hours. As a result...river
levels are forecast to rise and a flood warning is now in effect. It is
emphasized that the following forecast is based on the expected rainfall during
the next 24 hours. If less rainfall occurs...it may be necessary to revise this
stage forecast downward.

The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Blackwater River Near Baker
* From late Thursday night until Saturday morning
* At 9 PM Tuesday the stage was...2.5 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast
* Flood stage is 11.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Friday morning and continue to rise near
11.9 feet by Friday evening.
* At 11.0 feet...Minor flooding of secondary roads and lowlands from around
Baker to downstream of Baker.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...
Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather radio.
